title: yacg file configuration
description: description of the file configuration for yacg

Job.description: base object that describes a complete code generation process

name.description: a short identifier of that job

models.description: list of models used for that job

tasks.description: list of tasks that should run

BlackWhiteListEntry.description: entry of a type back/white list

type.description: how is the name to be interpreted. If type is missing, then 'type' is expected

SingleFileTask.description: parameter of a code generation task that creates one file

template.description: template to use for that task, either the name of a built in template, or a file system path, entry can also contain env vars in the format '{ENV_VAR_NAME}'

destFile.description: name and path for the file to create, entry can also contain env vars in the format '{ENV_VAR_NAME}'

templateParams.description: custom parameter that are passed to the template, while it is processed

MultiFileTask.description: parameter of a code generation task that creates one file per model type

template.description: template to use for that task, either the name of a built in template, or a file system path, entry can also contain env vars in the format '{ENV_VAR_NAME}'

destDir.description: path where the files will be created, entry can also contain env vars in the format '{ENV_VAR_NAME}'

destFilePrefix.description: prefix for the name of the created files

destFilePostfix.description: postfix for the name of the created files

destFileExt.description: file extention for the created files

upperCaseStartedDestFileName.description: the name of the destination file should start with an upper case

fileFilterType.description: this defines how the model is splitted to create the multiple files

templateParams.description: custom parameter that are passed to the template, while it is processed

createOnlyIfNotExist.description: create the new file only if it not already exists

createTmpFileIfAlreadyExist.description: instead of creation of the orininal file it will be created with a '.tmp' extention, if the file aleady exists

destDir.description: path where the files will be created, entry can also contain env vars in the format '{ENV_VAR_NAME}'

defaultMinElemCount.description: minimum number of elements that should be created for all types

defaultMaxElemCount.description: maximum number of elements that should be created for all types

minElemCount.description: how many elements should be generated for that type at minimum

maxElemCount.description: how many elements should be generated for that type at maximum

defaultKeyPropNames.description: list of names for primary key fields in the model

keyPropName.description: name of the attribute that represents the key for that type

useAll.description: should all values from the pool be used in the data gen

minSize.description: how many array elements should be generated for that attrib, at minimum

maxSize.description: how many array elements should be generated for that attrib, at maximum

defaultMaxDepth.description: default max level depth when generating object trees

maxDepth.description: max level depth when generating object trees for that attrib

TemplateParam.description: additional, template specific custom parameter for codegen task

requiredDomains.description: if set then this parameter only effected types of the specific domains

requiredTags.description: if set then this parameter only effected types or attributes with the specific tag

requiredNames.description: if set then this parameter only effected types or attributes with the specific name

blackListed.description: what elements should be excluded from handling

whiteListed.description: what elements should be included in the handling

singleFileTask.description: the code generation creates only one file

multiFileTask.description: the code generation creates one file per type

randomDataTask.description: the code generation creates one file per type with random data

Model.description: A model that should be used

schema.description: path to the jsonSchema file, entry can also contain env vars in the format '{ENV_VAR_NAME}'

domain.description: optional nameSpace string for the model, if not set the file name/path are used as namespace

blackListed.description: what elements should be excluded from handling

whiteListed.description: what elements should be included in the handling
